title: Importing And Loading
p_load: Click on the Scripts Manager button on the right of window, and you will see several built-in scripts in the script section, which should be sufficient for basic use.
p_imp: If you need to load a script from a third party, click on the folder icon, and Vitamins will open the script directory. Then, drop the .vps file in, and you can see it appears in script manager.
